title: Tiffany Haddish, Ice Cube, Lebron James, Running Into Your Ex, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Tiffany Haddish, Ice Cube, Lebron James, Running Into Your Ex, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Tiffany Haddish hosted the 2018 MTV Movie Awards. Ice Cube talks to the show about BIG3 basketball. Where is Lebron James going to play next? Find out which member of the show ran into their ex while with their new spouse. What does Tommy do in today's Phone Prank? The CEO tells us about the importance of God in our success, he also explains the relevance of other people's opinion of us and much more in Closing Remarks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
